page.title: 18TRANSPORT AND TOURISM
page.content: {TRANSPORT:-} The nearest railway station is at Whitby about 4 miles away and this station has very few trains.The trains only go to Teesside. Buses provide an hourly service through the village on their way from Middlesbrough to Whitby and the return.The fares are expensive and the journeys slow.Most people depend upon their own vehicle. {TOURISM:-} Many tourists visit the Whitby area in summer.Lythe offers accomodation at the Red Lion Inn as well as in a number of private houses.There are a few holiday cottages in the village and also there is a caravan site near the Red Lion and a camp site at Deepgrove Farm.
